value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Hurry! We're almost there. This is
where that report came from... Get
ready, $Nu.$k$p

$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hahh... I will... I will...avenge you...
Mother...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|How weak you are. Your strength is
already fading... You can't even fight
back.$k$pTo think you pointed your weapon at
me—a king! Did you think you would
survive? Did you?$k$pYou'll suffer for that impertinence.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Aaagh!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Feel that pain, child of ice. Feel it...
and tell me what you desire most.$k$pShould I scar your face with flame? Or
should I burn your fingers to ash, one
by one...$k$p$EFace_Smile|As I did to your mother?
What would you have me do, hmm?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Surtr!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ha-ha-hah! That is the fate of the
weak—to be trampled. So it goes...$k$p$EFace_Cool|Strike at me! Show me your last,
lingering flame—before it flickers out!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Surtr! I swear...that I... You will
never...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Is that all? She's already lost
consciousness. What a joke! Not
even fit for a toy...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|What next, my king?$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|We march. My flames will soon reach
every corner of this land.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|You don't waste any time, do you? As
for this one... You're just going to cast
her aside here?$k$p$EFace_Smile|Well, well, well... I'll give you plenty of
attention, sweetie... Hee-hee!$k$p$Sbs150|
